authors.name: Thibault Clérice, Ariane Pinche, Malamatenia Vlachou-Efstathiou et al.
authors.affiliation: Centre Jean-Mabillon, Ecole nationale des Chartes, PSL University

summary: Model trained on all available data, from 8th to 16th century, from GalliCorpora, CREMMA Medieval and CREMMA Medieval Lat, as well as data from Eutyches, Caroline Minuscule, DecameronFR. Transcription guidelines: https://hal.archives-ouvertes.fr/hal-03697382
description:
"# Transcription Guidelines 

See Ariane Pinche's guideline: https://hal.archives-ouvertes.fr/hal-03697382

Adaptation for latin on https://github.com/htR-United/cremma-medieval-lat

# Repositories

- https://github.com/htR-United/cremma-medieval-lat
- https://github.com/htR-United/cremma-medieval
- https://github.com/malamatenia/Eutyches
- https://github.com/Gallicorpora/HTR-MSS-15e-Siecle
- https://github.com/Gallicorpora/HTR-incunable-15e-siecle
- https://github.com/rescribe/carolineminuscule-groundtruth
- https://github.com/rescribe/carolineminuscule-groundtruth

See https://htr-united.github.io for more details.

# Size

| Dataset name                         | Project or company |  Coverage | Language |  Lines | Characters | Manuscripts |
|--------------------------------------|--------------------|----------:|---------:|-------:|-----------:|------------:|
| Eutyches                             | \textit{MA Thesis} |   850-900 |    Latin |  2,828 |     86,832 |           2 |
| Caroline Minuscule                   | Rescribe           |  800-1199 |    Latin |    457 |     17,155 |          17 |
| CREMMA Medieval                      | CREMMALab          | 1100-1499 |   French | 21,656 |    579,368 |          14 |
| CREMMA-Medieval-LAT                  | CREMMA             | 1100-1599 |    Latin |  6,648 |    240,291 |          18 |
| DecameronFR                          | \textit{Homework}  | 1430-1455 |   French |    751 |     19,821 |           1 |
| Données HTR manuscrits du 15e siècle | GalliCorpora       | 1400-1499 |   French |  5,937 |    169,221 |          11 |
| Incunables du 15e siècle             | GalliCorpora       | 1400-1499 |   French |  7,608 |    244,958 |          13 |


"
name: cremma-generic-1.0.1.mlmodel
